availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Blythe (Ghent, Carroll County postmaster)

body.p: A Kentucky-born grocery store owned. Residence: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky. Appointed Ghent postmaster on November 12, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ancestry.com. U.S., Appointments of U. S. Postmasters, 1832-1971 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2010. Original data: Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971. NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, 145 rolls. Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28. Washington, D.C.: National Archives, Ghent, Carroll County, KY, Volume 28, 12 Nov 1861, p. 36.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 2.
